deckOfCards

Class Card

  • java.lang.Object
    • deckOfCards.Card
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Aces, FaceCard, NumberCard

    public abstract class Card
extends java.lang.Object
    This abstract class contains all of the getter and setter methods for Card. Each child class will either be a number, ace, or face card. This class also has a method which can check if the suit of a card is valid by being either Hearts, Diamonds, Spades, or Clubs.
    Author:
    RossWeinstein

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Card(java.lang.String suit, java.lang.String face, int value)
      Constructs a card without provided suit, face, and value

    • Constructor Detail

      • Card

        public Card(java.lang.String suit,
            java.lang.String face,
            int value)
        Constructs a card without provided suit, face, and value
        Parameters:
        suit - the suit of the card. Must be Hearts, Diamonds, Spades, or Clubs
        face - the face of the card. Must be 2-10, J, Q, K, A
        value - how many points the card is worth
